nodes.text: Necra Phaest was a female Chiss who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. She made her living as a utility decorations engineer on board Vaiken Spacedock.

Necra Phaest first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Strongholds, a expansion for Star Wars: The Old Republic released in 2014 by BioWare. Universal prefab MK1-MK3s are traded in with Necra for utility furniture.
